game.name: TS Marketplace: Western Maryland Scenario Pack 01
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Western Maryland, a classic and admired railroad fondly nicknamed the “Wild Mary,” comes to captivating life in High Iron Simulations’ Western Maryland Scenario Pack 01.
